channel.title: Daily Gift
channel.description: Id like to make a chest or a gift box that every day they can click the chest or the gift box and get a random item. How would i go around doing this? will Rep ++ To be spoon fed :P

item.title: Daily Gift
item.dc:creator: @Xdivinex Xdivinex
item.description:
@Xdivinex wrote:

are you using a 508 server?

If you are using a 508 then…

You could make a sort of Drop party thing…
Make something like this in player.java

public int leverpull = 0

Then go to objectoption1.java and add:

[code] case 26194:
if (p.leverpull = 0) {
p.frames.createGlobalObject(115, p.heightLevel, 3049, 3376, 0, 10);
p.leverpull = 1;
} else {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You have already received your gift.”);
break;
}

case 115:
p.requestAnim(10017, 0);
p.frames.createGlobalObject(123, p.heightLevel, p.clickX, p.clickY, 0, 10);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(Misc.random(12000), 1, p.clickX, p.clickY, p.heightLevel, p.username);
break;[/code]

Don’t forget to add import to player.java if its not already there…
Although it should be but you never know.

Read full topic
